column5: Looking to do some shore fishing at the Hastings dam....can someone give driving directions from Toronto?  thanks
hwy 401 to cty rd 45 (2nd cobourg exit) go north for about 50km till you get to the bridge.
i tried typing in 'hasting dam ontario'...in google map and no returns...  what should I type in?  if the shore fishing still good there?
You don't need to google anything. 401 east then north on 45 takes you right to it.
